content: What popular toy consists of colorful interlocking plastic bricks that can be assembled and connected in various ways?

Ah, that sounds like Legos! I've heard so much about them. They're these little plastic bricks that you can snap together to build all sorts of things, right? I remember seeing kids create castles, spaceships, and even replicas of real-world objects with them. It's pretty amazing how versatile they are. I've also heard that Legos encourage creativity and help develop fine motor skills in children. Plus, they've been around for a long time, so they must be doing something right. Have you ever played with Legos yourself?
